jollyRoger.description: Features purple wings, claws, and a fire emblem symbolizing the phoenix

ship.name: Phoenix Pirates Ship
ship.description: Ship with a red phoenix figurehead, currently without sails or flag as they were taken by Brindo of the Accino Family

keyMoments.description: Flashback shows the Phoenix Pirates' defeat in the New World where first mate Vigaro sacrificed himself to save the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the tragic backstory that explains why the crew is in their current desperate situation.

keyMoments.description: The Phoenix Pirates debut disguised as fishermen, deceiving the Straw Hats to board the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the crew as sympathetic antagonists forced into betrayal by the Accino Family.

keyMoments.description: Phoenix Pirates express guilt and regret about betraying the kind Straw Hats, revealing they're being forced to work for the Accino Family.
keyMoments.significance: Humanizes the crew and establishes them as victims of the Accino Family's oppression rather than true villains.

objectives.objective: Recover their flag from the Accino Family
Puzzle's dream to become Pirate King

trivia.fact: The Phoenix Pirates are a non-canon crew appearing only in the anime-original Ice Hunter arc.
The crew originally consisted of ten members before Vigaro's death in the New World.
The crew was forced into servitude by the Accino Family who took their flag and forced them to work as bounty hunters.

name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

keyMoments.description: Stansen contacts the Accino Family to report capturing the Straw Hat Pirates with their 600-million berry bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the Accino Family's control over the Phoenix Pirates and their desire to capture high-bounty pirates.

keyMoments.description: The Accino Family debuts celebrating Don Accino's birthday at Lovely Land, awaiting the Straw Hat Pirates as his birthday present.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the main antagonist group of the Ice Hunter arc and establishes their headquarters and modus operandi.

formation.circumstance: Family-based bounty hunting organization, formed before episode 326

objectives.objective: Capture high-bounty pirates and collect their flags as trophies
Capture the Straw Hat Pirates as Don Accino's birthday present

trivia.fact: The Accino Family are a non-canon bounty hunting family appearing only in the anime-original Ice Hunter arc.
The family operates from Lovely Land, a golden castle with tropical climate maintained by Don Accino's heat powers.
The family has captured thousands of pirates in the Grand Line and collects their flags as trophies.
